name: Patagonia Live Simply Guitar Responsibili T-Shirt - Men's
description:
One cord is better than none. Part of Patagonia’s Responsibili-Tee® line that is made from recycled bottles and scrap fabrics. This repurposing of materials reduces water use during manufacturing and keeps stuff out of the world's landfills and incinerators.Regular fit wears like an old favourite.Made using 118g of recycled scrap fabric and 4.8 recycled plastic bottles.Responsibili-Tee® recycling process uses 96% less water and creates 45% less CO2 per unit than conventional
cotton T-shirt production.Taped shoulder seams for comfort and fit retention.Screen-print inks are PVC- and phthalate-free.Artwork by Geoff McFetridge.Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.

        Sustainability
